metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18928 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cyrus IMAP 2.5.x before 2.5.14 and 3.x before 3.0.12 allows privilege escalation because an HTTP request may be interpreted in the authentication context of an unrelated previous request that arrived over the same connection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-18928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cyrus-admin - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-caldav - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-clients - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-common - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-imapd - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-murder - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-nntpd - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-pop3d - 3.0.12-1
cyrus-replication - 3.0.12-1
libcyrus-imap-perl - 3.0.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1').
